translations.translation: Dashboards are graphical representations of your logs. Thanks to the different modules (curves, pie charts, counters, statistics ...), you get a synthetic view of your data. How many errors have occurred in the last 24 hours? Are they up or down? What is the most visited page today? How many customers this month? So much information immediately accessible. Having different tables allows you to display the data according to specific contexts and provides a greater readability of the information.
Are you sure you want to delete a dashboard: {{dashboardName}} ?
Select a data stream to target all widgets
A dashboard {{dashboardName}} has been successfully created
A dashboard {{dashboardName}} has been successfully updated
A dashboard {{dashboardName}} has been successfully deleted
An error has occurred while retrieving dashboards: {{message}}
An error has occurred while getting dashboard details: {{message}}
An error has occured while deleting a dashboard {{dashboardName}}: {{message}}
An error has occured while creating a dashboard {{dashboardName}}: {{message}}
An error has occured while updating a dashboard {{dashboardName}}: {{message}}
An error has occured while getting dashboard quota details: {{message}}
Graylog url not found for dashboard {{dashboardName}}
